# Cold (Domain)
## Overview
| **Deities:** | *Asgardian:* |  |
|---|---|---|
| | *Eberron:* |  |
| | *Golarion:* |  |
| | *Greyhawk:* | [[Bahamut]], Iborighu, Levistus, [[Muamman Duathal]], [[Olidammara]], [[Telchur]], Thrym, [[Zilchus]] |
| | *Kalamar:* | The Flaymaster |
| | *Krynn:* |  |
| | *Olympian:* |  |
| | *Other:* |  |
| | *Pharaonic:* |  |
| | *Toril:* | Auril, Ulutiu |

**Granted Power:** You can turn or destroy fire creatures as a good cleric turns undead. You can also rebuke or command cold creatures as an evil cleric rebukes undead.

**Cold Domain Spells**

**1** **[[Chill Touch (Spell)|Chill Touch]]****:** One touch/level deals 1d6 damage and possibly 1 Str damage.

**2** **[[Chill Metal (Spell)|Chill Metal]]****:** Cold metal damages those who touch it.

**3** **[[Sleet Storm (Spell)|Sleet Storm]]****:** Hampers vision and movement.

**4** **[[Ice Storm (Spell)|Ice Storm]]****:** Hail deals 5d6 damage in cylinder 40 ft. across.

**5** **[[Wall of Ice (Spell)|Wall of Ice]]****:** Ice plane creates wall with 15 hp +1/level, or hemisphere can trap creatures inside.

**6** **[[Cone of Cold (Spell)|Cone of Cold]]****:** 1d6/level cold damage.

**7** **[[Control Weather (Spell)|Control Weather]]****:** Changes weather in local area.

**8** **[[Polar Ray (Spell)|Polar Ray]]****:** Ranged touch attack deals 1d6/level cold damage.

**9 [[Obedient Avalanche (Spell)|Obedient Avalanche]]:** Snowy avalanche crushes and buries your foes.
